About Us

NeuroXR Collaborative was established as a joint venture between faculty members from the Indiana University School of Medicine Department of Psychiatry and the IUPUI School of Informatics, and we continue to grow with institutional and student support. Our teamâ€™s unique collaboration combines distinct areas of expertise and allows us to be more than the sum of our parts. We have established four primary goals aimed at maintaining our place at the forefront of XR research and development that targets mental health.
